content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to use the "get_hyperlinks" command to gather information from a ScienceDirect page on river restoration techniques, but received an HTTP 403 error.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration", "question": "river restoration techniques"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: discussing the evolution, challenges, and limitations of river restoration techniques in Europe, with a focus on maintaining ecological balance, increasing biodiversity, and improving water quality. The importance of considering natural processes and dynamic flow regimes is emphasized, and successful case studies are presented. The text also suggests a shift towards larger-scale projects and a focus on hyporheic processes, riparian zones, floodplains, and backwaters, and emphasizes the need for interdisciplinary approaches and post-project evaluation and monitoring. The greatest threats to progress are human population growth and climate change.\n\nLinks: ['\\nSkip to Main content\\n (https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration#main_content)', 'ScienceDirect (https://www.sciencedirect.com/)', 'Journals & Books (https://www.sciencedirect.com/browse/journals-and-books)', ' (https://www.sciencedirect.com/search)', 'Search (https://www.sciencedirect.com/search)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "river_restoration_techniques.txt", "text": "discussing the evolution, challenges, and limitations of river restoration techniques in Europe, with a focus on maintaining ecological balance, increasing biodiversity, and improving water quality. The importance of considering natural processes and dynamic flow regimes is emphasized, and successful case studies are presented. The text also suggests a shift towards larger-scale projects and a focus on hyporheic processes, riparian zones, floodplains, and backwaters, and emphasizes the need for interdisciplinary approaches and post-project evaluation and monitoring. The greatest threats to progress are human population growth and climate change."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "river_restoration_techniques.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_hyperlinks returned: Error: HTTP 403 error', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "river restoration techniques"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://www.engr.colostate.edu/~bbledsoe/CIVE413/Manual_of_River_Restoration_Techniques.htm", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stream_restoration", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration", "http://nwrm.eu/source/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://academic.oup.com/bioscience/article/60/3/209/257006", "https://www.gov.uk/flood-and-coastal-erosion-risk-management-research-reports/updating-the-river-restoration-centre-manual-of-restoration-techniques", "https://www.iowadnr.gov/Portals/idnr/uploads/RiverRestoration/toolbox/vegetative-restoration/Practice%202_Vegetative_Restoration_Full_Chapter.pdf"]', type='action_result')]
"""
